options.content: MR Troughput and Pass Rate

panels.description:
1. Total number of Pull/Merge request created.
2. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  count(*) as value
FROM 
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
WHERE
  gmr.project_id = $repo_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Merge Request Count

panels.description:
1. Total number of Pull/Merge request merged.
2. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  count(*) as value
FROM
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
WHERE
  gmr.project_id = $repo_id
  and state = 'merged'
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)

panels.title: Merge Request Pass Count

panels.description: Pull Request Pass Count/Pull Request Count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  1.0 * count(case when state = 'merged' then 1 else null end)/count(*)
FROM
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
WHERE
  gmr.project_id = $repo_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)

panels.title: Merge Request Pass Rate (%)

panels.description:
1. Pull Request Pass Rate over time.
2. The time granularity can be switched to week or month by "Time Interval" above. 
3. When Time Interval is set to "month", value "pull_request_pass_rate" of "2021-06-01" calculates the PR/MR whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with _mr_request_rate as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(gitlab_created_at), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gitlab_created_at))+1 DAY) as time,
    state
  FROM
    gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  WHERE
    gmr.project_id = $repo_id
    and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
)

SELECT 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  1.0 * count(case when state = 'merged' then 1 else null end)/count(*) as "Pull Request Pass Rate"
FROM _mr_request_rate
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Merge Request Pass Rate over Time

options.content: MR Review Metrics

panels.description:
1. Average PR/MR review time.
2. PR/MR review time refers to the time between the creation time and merged time of a PR/MR.
3. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner) and "Gitlab repo"("Choose Repo" filter at the upper-left corner)

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  avg(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,gitlab_created_at,merged_at))/1440 as value
from gitlab_merge_requests
WHERE
  merged_at is not null
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
  and project_id = $repo_id

panels.title: Avg Merge Request Review Time (day)

panels.description:
1. The 80th percentile PR/MR review time.
2. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner) and "Gitlab repo"("Choose Repo" filter at the upper-left corner)

targets.rawSql:
with _ranks as(
  select 
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,gitlab_created_at,merged_at)/86400 as metric,
    percent_rank() over (order by TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,gitlab_created_at,merged_at) asc) as ranks
  from gitlab_merge_requests
  WHERE
    merged_at is not null
    and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
    and project_id = $repo_id
  )
  
select
  now() as time,
  max(metric) as value
from _ranks
where 
  ranks <= 0.8
group by 1

panels.title: 80th Percentile Merge Request Review Time(day)

panels.description:
1. The average and 80th percentile PR/MR review time over time.
2. The time granularity can be switched to week or month by "Time Interval" above. 
3. When Time Interval is set to "month", the average review time of "2021-06-01" refers to the review time of PR/MR whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with reviewed_mr as(
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(gitlab_created_at), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gitlab_created_at))+1 DAY) as time,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,first_comment_time,merged_at)/86400 as review_time
  from gitlab_merge_requests
  WHERE
    merged_at is not null
    and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
    and project_id = $repo_id
)

select 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  avg(review_time) as "Average Review Time"
from reviewed_mr
group by 1
order by 1 asc

panels.title: Merge Request Review Time over Time

panels.description: The average round of PR/MR review.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  avg(review_rounds) as value
FROM 
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
WHERE
  state = 'merged'
  and review_rounds > 0
  and gmr.project_id = $repo_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Average Merge Request Review Round

panels.description:
1. Avg PR/MR Review Round over time.
2. The time granularity can be switched to week or month by "Time Interval" above. 
3. When Time Interval is set to "month", value "Avg Pull Request Review Round" of "2021-06-01" calculates the PR/MR whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp(DATE_ADD(date(gitlab_created_at), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gitlab_created_at))+1 DAY)) as time,
  avg(review_rounds) as "Pull Request Reveiw Round"
FROM
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
WHERE
  state = 'merged'
  and review_rounds > 0
  and gmr.project_id = $repo_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Average Merge Request Review Round over Time

panels.description: The average round of PR/MR review of PR authors.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  author_username as Author,
  avg(review_rounds) as value
FROM 
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
WHERE
  state = 'merged'
  and review_rounds > 0
  and gmr.project_id = $repo_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 3 desc
limit 20

panels.title: Average Merge Request Review Round by Author

panels.description: One-time pass rate for PR/MR over time.

targets.rawSql:
with _review_rounds as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(gitlab_created_at), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gitlab_created_at))+1 DAY) as time,
    review_rounds
  FROM
    gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  WHERE
    state = 'merged'
    and review_rounds > 0
    and gmr.project_id = $repo_id
    and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
)

SELECT 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  count(case when review_rounds = 1 then true else null end)/count(*) as one_time_pass_rate
FROM 
  _review_rounds
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: One-time Pass Rate for Code Reviews over Time

options.content: Commit Metrics

panels.description:
1. Total number of commits created.
2. The commits being calculated are filtered by "authored_date" (time filter at the upper-right corner) and "Gitlab repo"("Choose Repo" filter at the upper-left corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  count(*) as value
FROM gitlab_commits
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and project_id = $repo_id
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Commit Count

panels.description:
1. Number of commits created over time.
2. When Time Interval is set to "month", the commit_count" of "2021-06-01" calculates the commits whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with _commits as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(authored_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(authored_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(*) as commit_count
  FROM gitlab_commits
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(authored_date)
    and project_id = $repo_id
  group by 1
)

SELECT 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  commit_count as "Commit Count"
FROM _commits
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Commit Count over Time

panels.description: The number of commits from different repos.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  gp.name as metric,
  count(*) as value
FROM gitlab_commits gc
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.gitlab_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gc.project_id = $repo_id
group by 1,2
order by 1

panels.title: Commit Count by Repo

panels.description:
1. Sum of the number of added lines of code under all commits.
2. The commits being calculated are filtered by "authored_date" (time filter at the upper-right corner) and "Gitlab repo"("Choose Repo" filter at the upper-left corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS time,
  sum(additions) as value
FROM gitlab_commits gc
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.gitlab_id 
WHERE
  message not like '%Merge branch%'
  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gc.project_id = $repo_id
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Added LOC

panels.description:
1. Sum of the number of deleted lines of code under all commits.
2. The commits being calculated are filtered by "authored_date" (time filter at the upper-right corner) and "Gitlab repo"("Choose Repo" filter at the upper-left corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS time,
  sum(deletions) as value
FROM gitlab_commits gc
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.gitlab_id 
WHERE
  message not like '%Merge branch%'
  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gc.project_id = $repo_id
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Deleted LOC

panels.description: Added/deleted number of lines of code over time.

targets.rawSql:
with loc as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(authored_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(authored_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    sum(additions) as added_LOC,
    sum(deletions) as deleted_LOC
  FROM gitlab_commits
  WHERE
    message not like '%Merge branch%'
    and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
    and project_id = $repo_id
  group by 1
)

SELECT 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  added_LOC as "Added LOC",
  deleted_LOC as "Deleted LOC"
FROM loc
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Added and Deleted LOC over Time

panels.description: The number of added/deleted LOC from different commit authors.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  sum(additions) as "Added LOC",
  sum(deletions) as "Removed LOC",
  gc.author_name
FROM gitlab_commits gc 
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.gitlab_id
WHERE
  author_name is not null
  and message not like '%Merge branch%'
  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gc.project_id = $repo_id
group by 1,4
order by 2 desc
limit 20

panels.title: Added and Deleted LOC by Author

options.content: Development Cost Metrics

panels.description:
1. Number of people who have created or reviewed a Pull/Merge Request.
2. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner).

targets.rawSql:
with all_developers as(
  select 
    gitlab_reviewers.name as user_name
  from gitlab_merge_requests
  join gitlab_reviewers on gitlab_reviewers.merge_request_id = gitlab_merge_requests.gitlab_id

  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(gitlab_merge_requests.gitlab_created_at)
    and gitlab_merge_requests.project_id = $repo_id
  union
  select 
    distinct author_username as user_name 
  from gitlab_merge_requests
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(gitlab_merge_requests.gitlab_created_at)
    and gitlab_merge_requests.project_id = $repo_id
  union
  select 
    distinct author_name as user_name 
  from gitlab_commits
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(authored_date)
    and gitlab_commits.project_id = $repo_id
)


SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  count(distinct user_name) as developer_count
FROM all_developers

panels.title: Total Developer Count

panels.description:
1. Total number of Commit Authors.
2. The commits being calculated are filtered by "authored_date" (time filter at the upper-right corner).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS time,
  count(distinct author_name) as value
FROM gitlab_commits
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and project_id = $repo_id
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Commit Author Count

panels.description:
1. Number of Pull/Merge Request Reviewers.
2. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner).

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  count(distinct name)
from
  gitlab_reviewers

panels.title: Pull Request Reviewer Count

panels.description: Pull Request Reviewer Count/Total Developer Count

targets.rawSql:
with all_user_names as(
  select 
    distinct gitlab_reviewers.name as user_name
  from gitlab_reviewers
  join gitlab_merge_requests on gitlab_reviewers.merge_request_id = gitlab_merge_requests.gitlab_id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(gitlab_merge_requests.gitlab_created_at)
    and gitlab_reviewers.project_id = $repo_id
  union
  select 
    distinct author_username as user_name 
  from gitlab_merge_requests
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
    and project_id = $repo_id
  union
  select 
    distinct author_name as user_name 
  from gitlab_commits
  WHERE
   $__timeFilter(authored_date)
    and project_id = $repo_id
),

reviewer as (
  select distinct gitlab_reviewers.name from gitlab_reviewers
  join gitlab_merge_requests on gitlab_reviewers.merge_request_id = gitlab_merge_requests.gitlab_id
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(gitlab_merge_requests.gitlab_created_at)
    and gitlab_reviewers.project_id = $repo_id
)

SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  1.0*count(distinct reviewer.name)/count(distinct user_name) as value
FROM reviewer, all_user_names

panels.title: Pull Request Reviewer Rate (%)

list.definition: select distinct concat(name, ': ', gitlab_id) from gitlab_projects
list.label: Choose Repo
list.name: repo_id
list.query: select distinct concat(name, ': ', gitlab_id) from gitlab_projects
